description: '''The Duhks''' were a Canadian [[folk music|folk]] fusion band, formed in 2002 in [[Winnipeg]], [[Manitoba]], Canada. Featuring banjo, fiddle, guitar, percussion, and vocals, The Duhks blended folk music together with various [[Music of Canada|Canadian]] and [[Culture of the United States|American]] traditional styles, including soul, gospel, old-time country string, and [[zydeco]]. The band also commonly played [[Folk music of Ireland|traditional Irish dance music]], integrating Latin-influenced percussion as well as often Celtic- and Cajun-influenced fiddle-playing.
